attributes.action: ensure that David Beckham wins his 100th England cap.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: www.mgdproducts.co.uk urges you to sign this petition to ensure that former England captain David Beckham wins his 100th England cap. There is not enough room here to list all of the reasons why this must happen but if you think about it we are sure you will agree that if David Beckham is not allowed to win 100 England caps it will be a national disgrace

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
